author: nicko
msg: Added virtual SetQWForFiles(Stream) method to make it simpler for subclasses to wrap the output file stream, for example to add support for encryption

author: nicko
msg: Added Thread.MemoryBarrier call on NET_1_1 after writing to local variable, this is only required on SMP machines with a weak memory model (e.g. Itanium)
